Summary: the exact squiglly light shown on ufo hunter on the history chanel date of april 13 at 11pm detroit mi. time. I mean the exact footage.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: sighting detailsi left the old village bakery on mound rd. in warren mi. at 4:30 am. i am the delivery person for that company i was doing a delivery to our store at 18 mile and rochester rd. i drove mound rd. to 17 mile rd. and went do west when i came to dequinder i noticed in the sky a sguigly line that was darting back and fourth. as i got closer to rochester rd. i noticed the sguiglly line was kinda stationary and as i approached rochester rd. and stopped at the light the sgiugly line darted back and fouth within a 6 to 10 inch pattern as looking in the sky at about a 30 degree angle. as i watched and the light in the sky the light changed for me to go i turned right and the sguigly seem to follow in the same direction i was going for about a hundred feet then zipped off do south then was gone. then there was the the red buld shaped objects that where darting or bouncing in and out of the tree lines for a couple hundred yards and then gone.( this was after the sguigly line had dissappeared) thats not all as i was going down mound as i was driving to the rochester store the little red bulds i swear was following me because whats weird is every light that i went thru the transformers were blowing up as i was goin to 17 mile and i was observing these 2 little red bulbs. i am guessing you should be able to contact the power co. about the transformers going on the fritz that morning. those red bulbs i oserved a couple of different times. i dont know what going on but i am kinda getting the feeling something is not right. please have someone contact me. i will be home during the day of 4\14\08 until 5pm then i have a presentation to do in school till 9pm and then someone can call after 9:30 pm too.
